attributes.comment:
I may be one of many or just a single person but adoption is already a stressful
and wonderful part of someones life. Increasing prices are ok if the service itself is
guaranteed to be better and faster. But to have to wait 2 -3 months for a
document to be returned seems to be by far too long when everything these days
is electronic. I believe if the fees need to be increased then the services should be
up to par to the fees being asked. This will be just one more thing to add to make
adopting a child in need even harder. Thank you!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
